1. Identify the stadium where the games are played, since the claim states all games were in North Carolina and at the same stadium. In this table, it appears that all games except for one (Row 4) were played at "groves stadium winston - salem, nc". The exception is Row 4, where the game was played at "byrd stadium college park, md", which is outside North Carolina.

2. Since not all games in the table were played at the same stadium (Row 4), the claim that "7 games [were] played in North Carolina, and they [were] all at the same stadium" is FALSE.

The final answer will be:
